text:
Layar - https://www.layar.com/ - Amsterdam (The Netherlands)

We're hiring Python developers, QA engineers and DevOps engineers :)

The full job descriptions are at https://www.layar.com/about/jobs/ . But, in short, we're looking for passionate, talented engineers to help us shape the augmented reality landscape.

Apply at the link above, or drop me a line at rbp at layar.com.
